A

add(Student) - Method in class StudentList
Appends the specified student to the end of the student list.

C

compareTo(Object) - Method in class Student
The compareTo method checks whether the first name and the last name of the student match in the list and returns 0 if the names do match.
contains(Student) - Method in class StudentList
Checks if the student list contains the student specified in the parameter.
credit - Variable in class Student
 

I

Instate - Class in <Unnamed>
This class overrides the toString() method in order to store information of an instate student and overrides tuitionDue() method in order to compute how much an instate student will have to pay.
Instate(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class Instate
Constructor initializes the first name, last name, credits, and the amound of funds for a student.
INSTATE_PERCOST - Static variable in class Student
 
International - Class in <Unnamed>
This class overrides toString, tuitionDue and includes testbed main class to test all of the methods of an international student.
International(String, String, int, boolean) - Constructor for class International
This constructor initializes the first name, last name, number of credits, and exchange variable.
INTERNATIONAL_PERCOST - Static variable in class Student
 
INTERNATIONAL_STUDENT_FEE - Static variable in class Student
 
isEmpty() - Method in class StudentList
Checks if the number of students is 0.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Instate
This main testbed method tests the constructor and the tuitionDue() and the toString method.
main(String[]) - Static method in class International
This testbed main method tests all of the constructors and all of the methods of the class.
main(String[]) - Static method in class Outstate
This testbed main method tests all of the methods and constructor to ensure its correctness.
main(String[]) - Static method in class TuitionManager
Main driver that performs the I/O with the terminal.

O

Outstate - Class in <Unnamed>
This class overrides the toString and the tuitionDue of the Student class to obtain information about an Out of State student.
Outstate(String, String, int, boolean) - Constructor for class Outstate
This constructor initializes the first name, last name, number of credits, and whether student is in the tristate area.
OUTSTATE_PERCOST - Static variable in class Student
 

P

print() - Method in class StudentList
Prints student information along with the tuition due for individual students.

R

remove(Student) - Method in class StudentList
Removes the specified student from the list.

S

Student - Class in <Unnamed>
This is an abstract class which includes an abstract method called tuition due that its subclasses inherit.
Student(String, String, int) - Constructor for class Student
This constuctor initializes the first name, last name, and the number of credits for all subclasses to inherit.
StudentList - Class in <Unnamed>
Manages a list of students in a form of an array.
StudentList() - Constructor for class StudentList
Constructor used to initialize the student list to a given default GROW_SIZE of 4.

T

toString() - Method in class Instate
This method overrides the Student toString method in order to include the tuition due for the instate student.
toString() - Method in class International
This toString() method overrides the toString() method of the Student class to include tuition amount of an international student.
toString() - Method in class Outstate
This toString method overrides the student class toString in order to show tuition for out of state student.
toString() - Method in class Student
This method returns the string of the first name, last name, and the number of credits student is taking.
tuitionDue() - Method in class Instate
This method overrides the abstract method of the student class in order to compute the amount of tuition for an instate student.
tuitionDue() - Method in class International
This tuitionDue() is overriding the abstract method of the Student class to compute how much tuition the international student has to pay.
tuitionDue() - Method in class Outstate
This method computes the tuition amount of an out of state student and overrides the abstract method of the student class.
tuitionDue() - Method in class Student
This is the abstract method and computes the tuition amount by the subclasses in order to compute the tuition amounts by the respective subclasses of instate, outstate, and international.
TuitionManager - Class in <Unnamed>
Manages the driver used to run I/O commands through the command line.
TuitionManager() - Constructor for class TuitionManager
